name: Mathpractice
0:
”Alexa, open math practice”
”Alexa, start math practice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math practice
des: Practice is the path to mastery. With Math practice, you will become a master of the basic math operations of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Tell Alexa what operation you want to train and at what difficulty, either easy, normal or hard. Alexa will then keep presenting you with new equations to solve, non stop. Try it now, say "Alexa, open math practice".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
